main event: A civilian observed an unidentified flying object, described as odd-shaped and aircraft-like, over North Hudson, N.Y. on July 14, 1966.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 20 minutes and had a course directed south,The object emitted white and blue lights that appeared circular,The observer reported seeing white streaks in the sky and a light at the center of the object,The observer was a 52-year-old unemployed conservation worker with limited education,The object was assessed by a reporting officer as likely two aircraft involved in a refueling operation.
sighted object: odd-shaped aircraft-like object with white and blue lights
witness description: civilian observer, 52 years old, unemployed conservation worker
